::Zardus/Mosquitor::

Zardus looks over at Wheeljack. "Hurricane, take them to CR chambers and put them in. Set the CR chambers in the reprogramming lab to keep them in stasis lock. Take Mosquitor with you and do the same with the femm he's carrying. Once you get there, you know where to lead Mosquitor next."

Since Mosquitor was already marching off toward the exit, despite having any idea where the CR chambers or the lab were, Zardus points at the back of the bug's head, making a firing motion. He then turns to Najah after recieving Composer's message.

"We'll reprogram them and have a few extra soldiers on our side. Can you go help Composer with all the stuff he's carrying?"

He then turns to Wheeljack. "I need you to help prepare an Alliance bot for a mission at Maximal city. Can you disguise her as a Maximal?"
